18 #ifndef GANDIVA_FUNCTION_HOLDER_REGISTRY_H
19 #define GANDIVA_FUNCTION_HOLDER_REGISTRY_H
20 
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <string>
23 #include <unordered_map>
24 
25 #include "gandiva/function_holder.h"
26 #include "gandiva/like_holder.h"
27 #include "gandiva/node.h"
28 #include "gandiva/status.h"
29 
30 namespace gandiva {
31 
32 #define LAMBDA_MAKER(derived) \
33  [](const FunctionNode& node, FunctionHolderPtr* holder) { \
34  std::shared_ptr<derived> derived_instance; \
35  auto status = derived::Make(node, &derived_instance); \
36  if (status.ok()) { \
37  *holder = derived_instance; \
38  } \
39  return status; \
40  }
41 
43 class FunctionHolderRegistry {
44  public:
45  using maker_type = std::function<Status(const FunctionNode&, FunctionHolderPtr*)>;
46  using map_type = std::unordered_map<std::string, maker_type>;
47 
48  static Status Make(const std::string& name, const FunctionNode& node,
49  FunctionHolderPtr* holder) {
50  auto found = makers().find(name);
51  if (found == makers().end()) {
52  return Status::Invalid("function holder not registered for function " + name);
53  }
54 
55  return found->second(node, holder);
56  }
57 
58  private:
59  static map_type& makers() {
60  static map_type maker_map = {
61  {"like", LAMBDA_MAKER(LikeHolder)},
62  };
63  return maker_map;
64  }
65 };
66 
67 } // namespace gandiva
68 
69 #endif // GANDIVA_FUNCTION_HOLDER_REGISTRY_H
